      • findPhotos

        private java.util.List<java.net.URL> findPhotos​(java.io.File folder,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URL> list)
        Recursive method which check in a current folder all files inside if it is a folder it calls this function with the folder in parameter otherwise if it's an image type, it is added to the List
        Parameters:
        folder - current folder
        list - the list of the URL of the images
        Returns:
        the completed list with URL of the images in the current folder
